creator: kurt@uangel.com
text:
Dear JMeter developers,

What do you think about an addition of "Waiting  for response" option to TCP Sampler and  TCP Sampler Config?

I think, in order o support some asynchronous communication, that will be very helpful.

So, if we add one more checkbox (or if provided, 3-state checkbox) named "Waiting  for response" or "Send request only".

Thank you!

Bugzilla is not well suited to discussion.

Please raise the issue on the dev list.
